name: Shoot Lasers
description:
You can pause using the escape key

There are 5 enemies in this game:

Small ones that are fast and have less health and damage but they come in large groups

Ships balanced decently by the damage, speed and health and come in pairs

A ship that does slightly greater damage than normal and shoots pulses of laser

Healers that run away from you if there's no enemies around to heal

Predictors that have their aim always locked on you by predicting your position depending on your speed and direction and they do a ton of damage
